name: person-man climbs a mountain (extremely early demo)
name_original: person-man climbs a mountain (extremely early demo)
description:
THIS IS AN EXTREMELY EARLY DEMO.

Small update: added a new section to the level and a reset level function.

Things coming soon: another level and a main menu.

Dundoc site: https://www.dundoc.com/project/7191/person-man-climbs-a-mountain

join person man as he attempts to climb a mountain, unfortunately he has no idea how difficult this task will be.

CONTROLS:

W - jump

A - move left

D - move right

S - fall through certain platforms

R - reset level
